Inese Latvia

Amazing breakfast! Unique design of the room and main spaces. Highly recommended!

Greta Lithuania

It’s my second stay here and I’m definitely coming back! It’s located in my favorite district of Warsaw, close to many places of interest. The rooms are spacious, the beds comfortable, and it’s so nice to discover all the nice little details. I love the shower gel here, it smells really nice. Great value for money!

Kalina Poland

The breakfast was absolutely delicious! The staff was very nice and helpful :) I very very recommend this hotel if you're looking for a nice place to stay in Warsaw.

Urszula Poland

Breakfast was really great, room design was spectacular.

Zane Latvia

The staff were courteous and polite, the room was pretty comfortable. The bathroom was spacious, the shower cabin was big enough. The breakfast was delicious.

Mariia Poland

Perfect location (3 min walk) from the Praga Centrum concert venue (my entire trip to Poland was based on this concert so this was important to me). Good direct bus connection to Warsaw Central Railway station (bus 160) and plenty of trams in the vicinity, too. My first time in the Praga district and really enjoyed the street art and architecture of the area. Good hygiene practices in the hotel (travelling during COVID-19 crisis) - the receptionist was wearing a mask, there was hand sanitiser on the reception desk. Loved the open brickwork "lofthouse" style of my bedroom, really cosy bed, lots of space, large bathroom with good shower. Complimentary mineral water (still and sparkling), tea and coffee making facilities, excellent aircon and large windows that open. Staff were very friendly and helpful, they spoke great English and I was given a voucher for a complimentary glass of wine during my stay which was very kind.

Rachel United Kingdom

Not close to the City center, but offers parking, breakfast and super modern facilities! The staff was very nice and greeted us with the glass of wine! The restaurant downstairs looked awesome. We had our breakfast on the outside terrace and it was very nice. Design pearl in the city of Warsaw!

Žanete Latvia

Original, art style spacious room. Wireless charging was a nice surprise. Comfortabke bed.

Marek Czech Republic

Great venue, super friendly staff, fine food and wines. We will come back.

Bart Belgium

Boutique ARTHOTEL STALOWA 52 is located in a renovated, 100-year old tenement house in a bohemian Praga district of Warsaw. Free WiFi is available in the whole building. The building is monitored and front desk is available 24 hours a day.

Each room has its own individual style and original décor inspired by the post-industrial character of Praga. All the rooms come with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a flat-screen TV. Free mineral water is available in the rooms.

There is a glass patio on the ground floor, where the ARTBISTRO STALOWA 52 restaurant is located, serving modern Polish cuisine.

The property also features conference rooms that has direct access to the garden.

ARTHOTEL STALOWA 52 is located 4 km from the National Stadium. Szwedzka metro station is located 100 m from the property. The Old Town is 7 tram stops from the property.

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.2 for a two-person trip.

We speak your language!

ARTHOTEL STALOWA 52 has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 21 Aug 2012.
